content: basic knowledge of crochet skills is needed what you will need yarn red orange yellow brown hook size to match yarn weight stitch marker poly-fil for stuffing scissors yarn needle safety eyes abbreviations magic_ring ~ magic_ring chain ~ chain single_crochet ~ single_crochet double_crochet ~ double_crochet half_double_crochet ~ half_double_crochet picot ~ picot stitch link provided crab stitch link provided slip_stitch ~ slip_stitch increase ~ increase decrease ~ decrease repeat ~ repeat round ~ round skip ~ skip f/o ~ fasten_off notes 1 this pattern is worked in continuous rounds & us terms 2 i use the yarn over technique using a different way may throw sts off 3 i use the invisible decrease technique 4 i used i love this yarn in all colors 5 i used a size g hook 6 i used 10mm eyes pattern by allyson morse my crazy cat crochet mycrazycatcrochet on etsy allyson morse on ravelry @mycrazycatcrochet on instagram this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed resold translated published altered shared posted for sale or free at all you can sell items made from this pattern but please credit me allyson morse @mycrazycatcrochet / #mycrazycatcrochet on instagram with finished item message me with any questions follow/tag me on instagram/tiktok @mycrazycatcrochet with your finished project feel free to add your finished project here in my ravelry happy crocheting
